title: Shutdown Fullcast 8.02: Fixing The Olympics With Drugs
description:
FACT: Performance enhancing drugs have always clouded Olympic competitions.
FACT: Enforcing the rules against PEDs can be incredibly difficult and occasionally lead to unjust results.
FACT: What if we just let all the athletes use one drug tailored to their sport?
FACT: Also Spencer invented cross-country MMA.
FACT: There is no mention of college football on this episode for roughly 45 minutes.
FACT: We found a new job for Jim Mora.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
